entry.title: About Me
entry.content: .polaroid { width: 150px; height: 150px; border-radius:8px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19); } Hi, Iâ€™m Yunzhe Xu, a graduate student studying at Stevens Institute of Technology, in the greater New York area.I like programing, learning new technology is my passion. I want to be a web developing superhero and create awesome web applications in the future! What I know Front-endHTML, CSS, JavaScript, ES6, Bootstrap, React Back-endNodeJS, APIs, NoSQL, Java, SQL AppAndroid Development Data AnalysisPython GameUnity What I am learning and want to learn Angular2, Typescript, Vue, React Native, Electron, Swift My Works click the icon to see the live demo React App Pokedex Marvel Heroes I am writing some articles about what I learned in my blog. One for summarizing knowledge, another for sharing ideas. By the way, I am actively seeking for an internship or full time job recently. Feel free to contact me. Just send an email to xuyunzhe0607@gmail.com
